record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 976

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 976 has been received at the desk from the House, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the title of the bill for the first time.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for a second reading but object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will receive a second reading on the next legislative day.
